update material

material_code = #{materialCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
material_count = #{materialCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

meterial_location = #{meterialLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
meterial_price = #{meterialPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where material_id = #{materialId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update material set material_name = #{materialName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, material_code = #{materialCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, material_count = #{materialCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, material_message = #{materialMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, meterial_quantity = #{meterialQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, meterial_unit_weight = #{meterialUnitWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, meterial_location = #{meterialLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, meterial_price = #{meterialPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where material_id = #{materialId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
